name: On The Edge Of Time
description:
From Newgrounds - August 2010

hello everyone, i made this game at college as my FMP, its not finished and i didn't really know how to use flash so its not the best game ever, but it works, thats the main thing. lol. hope you like what there is to play anyway, please leave some comments and maybe i will make a new game or make some changes to it. there was a lot more put into the creation of this, i also wrote a story to go with it and an animated introduction which i might also upload at some point. :D thanks for clicking on it, have fun ^_^
